-> _ = "breakpoint"
(godebug) n
-> x = mul(x, x)
(godebug) list


    func main() {
    	x := mul(1, 2)
    	_ = "breakpoint"
--> 	x = mul(x, x)
    	if x == 4 {
    		fmt.Println("It works! x == 4.")
    	} else if n := 2; n == 3 {
    		fmt.Println("Math is broken. Ah!")

    func main() {
    	x := mul(1, 2)
    	_ = "breakpoint"
    	x = mul(x, x)
--> 	if x == 4 {
    		fmt.Println("It works! x == 4.")
    	} else if n := 2; n == 3 {
    		fmt.Println("Math is broken. Ah!")
    	} else {

(godebug) n
-> } else if n := 2; n == 3 {
(godebug) l

    	_ = "breakpoint"
    	x = mul(x, x)
    	if x == 4 {
    		fmt.Println("It works! x == 4.")
--> 	} else if n := 2; n == 3 {
    		fmt.Println("Math is broken. Ah!")
    	} else {
    		fmt.Println("What's going on? x ==", x)
    	}
